pageContext.claim: “In all fairness to the Democrats, many of them want the wall. And I see it. They're just dying to say what they want to say, but they can't say it as well as they would be able to if they were allowed to do it.”
pageContext.analysis: There is little evidence that "many" Democratic lawmakers are "dying" to express their support for the wall. There is pretty universal opposition to concept among Democrats, especially because polling indicates less-than-majority support for the idea among Americans.
